site_name: Land At Junction Of Chase Road & Victoria Road
description: Details of remediation scheme, pursuant to condition 24 to planning permission PP/2011/4250 dated 08/03/2013 for Development of site to provide a part four (4), part ten (10), part twelve (12), part fourteen (14), part eighteen-storey (18) building, plus basement, comprising 673 square metres of commercial floor space for flexible use for shops (within Use Class A1), Financial and Professional Services (Use Class A2), Restaurants and Cafes (Use Class A3), Hot Food Takeaway (Use Class A5), Business (Use Class B1) or non-residential Institution (Use Class D1) and 151 residential units above (83 x 1-bedroom, 65 x 2-bedroom and 3 x 3 bedroom flats); together with alterations to the existing access and provision of 30 car parking spaces (15 to a disabled standard) and 169 cycle storage spaces at basement level (Outline Planning Application -  Access, Layout and Scale being sought and Appearance and Landscaping matters to be reserved) (See PP/2013/4830 for plans)
